column2: Hey there, were Crazy Holidays, and were all about making travel experiences unforgettable     Were on the hunt for a creative Presentation and Design Specialist to join our dynamic team in Bangalore     If youre passionate about turning travel stories into captivating visuals, creating stunning presentations, and are a wizard with design tools and video editing, wed love to have you on our journey!             Responsibilities:       1. PPT Maestro: Craft visually stunning PowerPoint presentations that transport our customers to exciting destinations and showcase our travel packages.     2. Design Extraordinaire: Use your design magic, especially with Photoshop, to create eye-catching graphics, brochures, and marketing materials that reflect the spirit of our adventures.     3. Video Guru: Edit travel videos, from exotic destination clips to customer testimonials, to capture the essence of our tours.     4. Slideshow Pro: Create captivating slideshow videos for travel webinars, promotional events, and digital marketing campaigns.     5. Collaborative Spirit: Collaborate closely with the marketing team to ensure branding and messaging consistency.     6. Stay Creative: Keep a keen eye on design trends and stay ahead in the world of visual storytelling.     7. Social Media Promotion: Conduct promotions through Company Social Media Channels, including, WhatsApp, FB,, Youtube, Twitter and Google. Monitor and evaluate the response and give replies and feedback wherever necessary.       Qualifications:       - Proven experience in creating captivating presentations, graphic design, and video editing.     - Proficiency in PowerPoint, Photoshop, and video editing software.     - A passion for visual storytelling and a creative flair.     - Strong attention to detail and an eye for aesthetics.     - Effective communication and team collaboration skills.     - A portfolio showcasing your design and video work is a plus.
column11: Graphics, Online promotion, Graphic designing, Social media, Marketing campaigns, Tool design, Video editing, Promotional events, Photoshop, Digital marketing

column2: Key Responsibilities: Designing world-class marketing materials for social media, blogs, newsletters, advertisements, and websites. Crafting visually appealing and informative infographics. Collaborating with the marketing team to develop creative content strategies. Editing and enhancing videos to create compelling visual narratives (if applicable). Ensuring timely delivery of high-quality content to meet fast-paced startup demands. Taking initiative in generating innovative ideas and contributing to creative brainstorming sessions. Skills & Requirements: Demonstrable creativity and proficiency in graphic design software such as Adobe Creative Suite (Figma, Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign). Ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment and deliver high-quality work under pressure. Strong organizational skills with the capability to manage multiple projects simultaneously. Proven track record of meeting deadlines and working efficiently without compromising on quality. Excellent communication skills and a proactive attitude towards collaboration. Prior experience in video editing is preferred but not mandatory. Immediate availability for full-time engagement.Role & responsibilities

Industry : E-Commerce  In-depth knowledge of PPC advertising, bid management, and campaign optimization Familiarity with Google Analytics and other relevant analytics tools. Experience in planning, implementing, and optimizing Google Ads campaigns. column2: We are looking for a Graphic Designer & Digital Marketing Executive. The ideal candidate will have strong creative skills and a portfolio of work which demonstrates their passion for illustrative design and Digital Marketing. Responsibilities * Maintain awareness of current industry and technology standards, social media, competitive landscape and market trends * Develop and manage digital marketing campaigns through website and social media banners, posters, flyers, brochures, catalogues and other medias.  * Develop concepts by hand or with software, and execute original content by determining the ideal usage of color, text, font style, imagery, and layout * Manage the design and uploading process for all project materials, based on best practices for using a content management system Requirements  * Bachelor's degree in Graphic Design or related field * 2-6 years of experience in web page design  * Minimum 2 years of experience in WordPress Skills Required * Adobe * Illustrator *Digital marketing *SEO *Coral Draw
column11: Illustrator, Digital Marketing, Graphic Designing, Photoshop, Html/Css, SMM, Wordpress, Corel Draw, SEO, Logo Design

column2: You've     worked on multiple digital projects         already and      you're     interested in learning more about the financial industry and building AI-driven solutions.                  you're     experienced with large systems thinking         and engaging with     content      at scale, bringing clarity to complexity     through optimizing information architecture, taxonomy, and terminology.                 you're     able to      distill dense      technical jargon         into simple, readable, human language.                  You enjoy      working with multi-disciplinary teams         (all the way from product managers and engineers to data scientists and researchers) and      have strong written and verbal communication skills         that can bring your team together to create simple and effective customer experiences.                  you're     a      tireless advocate for the customer         and excited about creating and iterating on product designs, discovering what works best and applying your knowledge to create incredible software products that will change the world for the better.                  The role's broad scope will give you ample room to flex your content design muscles both on projects that have immediate impact on our Microsoft business applications portfolio and our greater AI investments, but also explorations that shape our long-term strategy, vision and the UX direction of the company.                             Required Qualifications                             8+ years of combined experience in content-focused roles, including 4+ years as a Content Designer or UX Writer     .                      A portfolio     of     shipped     projects detailing the      full      design process from incubation to execution, including research,     collaboration,     stakeholder      management     ,     iteratio     n     ,      release,      and results     .                 Experience working in agile and lean methodologies in a multi-disciplinary working environment.                  Experience supporting and      leveraging     User Research in the      content      design process to      optimize     experiences      for customers.                 Proficiency     working     with     in modern component-based design tools (     eg     Figma, Sketch,      etc..     ).                     Preferred Qualifications                     Ability to drive success through moments of ambiguity, helping drive clarity amongst the team.                  A detective in your work,      you value      asking good questions and investigating the source of      assumption     s                 A creative relationship with language     and an appreciation for      the importance of      good storytelling                 Comfortable     leading/     facilitating     conversations between      stakeholders to      find      alignment                 Excellent verbal and written communication skills and the ability to present your work to peers across disciplines.                 Experience scoping, prioritizing, and estimating goal-oriented design efforts accurately.                 Experience designing end-to-end enterprise-scale cloud software or services.                 Experience designing for AI-driven solutions.                 Awareness of inclusive design principles including accessibility.                               Responsibilities                       Work closely with product managers     , designers,     researchers,      and engineers, bringing a purely customer-centric mindset to the table to deliver high-quality outcomes that empower customers to do more.                  Communicate complex concepts simply     .      From wordsmithing on the ground to architecting information at high altitudes, you use language to      design     experiences that           flow           .                  Become an expert      on     Microsoft s brand voice,      UI     copy patterns, and feature naming conventions to      write      consistent,     understandable messaging.                     C     raft      powerful n     arrative     s to     showcase     and evangelize      features      at regular intervals                     Embody the "One Microsoft" motto and extend your design thinking beyond your own project, considering holistic company value in every solution you build.                  Initiate and facilitate UX team-building efforts such as design reviews, workshops, pitch decks or other materials that help align people on common goals/direction.                  Contribute to a welcoming and safe working space, fostering a diverse and inclusive team environment.                  Embody our          Cult     ure          and          Values
